description.displayText: Kendra has been our full-time nanny for the past 4 years, but we are no longer in a need of a full-time babysitter.  She has taken care of my 2 boys (ages 8 and 4) with ease.  I interviewed several nannies, but chose Kendra due to her calm and professional demeanor, and many years of childcare experience. I know my boys are always safe and happy with Kendra.  She is fun and silly with them, but knows how to keep them in line when necessary.  Kendra handled school pick-ups and drop-offs, after school activities, playdates, feeding, bath time and light housekeeping.  Kendra is also great with babies.  She started with us when my youngest was 6 month old.  Please do not hesitate to reach out for further information.

description.displayText: Kendra has been watching my son approx 50 hours/week since he was 4.5 months.  She is incredibly loving, attentive, responsible and reliable.  She reads to him, sings to him, cooks for him, laughs with him, and teaches him to be aware of the world around him.  She has found him a large community of friends in the neighborhood, and takes him on outings at least once a day.  We know he is her priority when she is watching him, and we trust her completely with his safety.  She is a genuine personality, and truly cares about children.  We strongly recommend her, and are happy to speak to prospective families.  Kendra can provide our contact info.

description.displayText: Kendra has cared for our children for over five years. She is punctual, responsible, caring, fun and outgoing. Frequently a parent has gone out of his or her way to let me know how great she is with our kids. You will not be disappointed.
